GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of user with username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: butter_bridge
articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of article with articl_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the number of votes of an article with article_id, returns the updated object of article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments object with article_id

exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: The owls are not what they seem.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: creates a new comment on article with article_id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments the votes of a comment object with comment_id by newVote, serves the updated comment object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment object with comment_id
